name: Race, Recycle, Restart
description:
You're doing a car race but your car has only the chassis. Find parts on the road to build your own car and ride it to the finish line as quick as possible without destroying it.

Controls:

  • WASD: Walk/Drive
  • E: Pickup objects and use them as parts of your car
  • R: Kick
  • F: Ride your car

Graphics: Rem
Audio: Max
Code: Remax
